citations.narrative:
The facility does not have medical records for vaccinations and preventative care given. The licensee reports all adult
dogs had the required rabies, distemper, and parvovirus vaccines in Spring 2024, along with deworming, but there is no
written record. Medical records are important so that adequate veterinary care can be assessed during inspections.
Correct by ensuring copies of medical records, complete with the names of all vaccinations and treatments administered
and the dates of administration, and the identification of the dog are created and maintained and are made available
during inspection. Correct from December 3, 2024, onward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(b)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility does not have medical records for vaccinations and preventative care given. The licensee reports all adult 
dogs had the required rabies, distemper, and parvovirus vaccines in Spring 2024, along with deworming, but there is no 
written record. Medical records are important so that adequate veterinary care can be assessed during inspections. 
Correct by ensuring copies of medical records, complete with the names of all vaccinations and treatments administered 
and the dates of administration, and the identification of the dog are created and maintained and are made available 
during inspection. Correct from December 3, 2024, onward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
